name: Where is the signal
description:
The game was made in the 2022 Nationale Game jam.

Created by Dev: Menno Marcus Art: Robert Kasperi Bram.

Controls:

WASD keys for the movement.

Press the space key to jump.

Press the R key to reload the gun and click the left mouse button to shoot the gun.

How to Play:

Try finding the wifi routers and USB sticks to fix the wifi and kill the zombies and fix All the wifi routers to win the game.

thanks for reading, have a nice day :}
